meanings.definition: Raise (something) to a higher standard, in particular improve (equipment or machinery) by adding or replacing components.
meanings.sent1: I will upgrade my phone by getting a new battery.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to upgrade their software to the latest version.
meanings.sent3: Trying to upgrade a toaster by adding wheels might not be the best idea.
meanings.sent4: She managed to upgrade her wardrobe with just a few new accessories.
meanings.sent5: The chef knew how to upgrade a simple salad into a gourmet dish.

meanings.definition: A new version of or an improvement on an existing product or system.
meanings.sent1: The latest upgrade of the app includes many new features.
meanings.sent2: I'm excited to see the upgrade of the computer operating system.
meanings.sent3: His idea of an upgrade to the car was to add a rocket booster.
meanings.sent4: The upgrade to the house was so drastic, it felt like a whole new place.
meanings.sent5: The upgrade to the playground equipment made it much safer for the kids.
